reasoning_summary:
**Request for Permission: delete_file**

The AI agent is requesting permission to execute the `delete_file` action with the argument `"path": "task_tracker.db"`. This action will permanently delete the database file named `task_tracker.db`, which stores task tracking data.

To complete the task of deleting the database, the agent needs to perform this action because it has been instructed to delete the database. The agent requires permission to execute this action to ensure that the deletion is intentional and not an error.

The expected outcome of this action is that the `task_tracker.db` file will be deleted from the system, freeing up storage space and removing any associated task tracking data.
